Activity: Review project plan and presentation for the kickoff meeting.
Final preparations for the kickoff meeting: Confirm meeting room, presentation setup, and attendee list.

Project Kickoff Meeting: Present the finalized project plan, outlining goals, timelines, roles, and responsibilities for each team. Facilitate a Q&A session to address concerns and ensure alignment across all departments. @PEOPLE
Post-kickoff meeting: Compile feedback and action items from the meeting. Update the project plan accordingly.
Lunch. Read an article about the current SEC regulatory environment.

Meeting with @legal-1 and @comp-1: Discuss regulatory compliance requirements for registering a market-neutral statistical arbitrage fund. Establish a timeline for preparing and submitting required documentation to the SEC. Understand the role of @audit-1.
Update project plan with regulatory compliance milestones. Create a separate risk register to track potential regulatory hurdles.
Schedule individual meetings with team leads for the following week to deep-dive into specific task breakdowns and resource allocation.
Review and consolidate all project documentation. Ensure everything is readily accessible in the project management system.
Leave office. Relax and catch up on personal emails.
